mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id ,a.user_pw ,a.user_name ,a.user_dob ,a.user_conutry ,a.user_level ,a.user_gender ,a.user_useNy ,a.user_delNy ,a.user_addr ,a.user_email FROM airLanguage_member a WHERE 1=1 AND memberSeq = #{memberSeq}

select a.memberSeq ,a.user_id ,a.user_name ,a.user_level ,a.lean_language ,a.user_gender ,a.user_favoriteLanguage ,b.* FROM airLanguage_member a LEFT JOIN airLanguage_memberUploaded b ON b.pseq = a.memberSeq WHERE a.memberSeq = #{memberSeq}
SELECT a.memberSeq ,a.user_name ,a.user_email ,a.user_id FROM airLanguage_member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = #{snsId} AND a.user_name = #{user_name}
select count(*) from airLanguage_member where 1=1 and user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT a.memberSeq ,a.user_id FROM airLanguage_member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT a.user_id ,a.memberSeq ,a.user_name FROM airLanguage_member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = #{user_id} AND a.user_pw = #{user_pw}

SELECT a.memberSeq ,a.user_id ,a.user_name ,a.user_level ,a.lean_language ,a.user_gender ,a.user_favoriteLanguage ,b.* FROM airLanguage_member a LEFT JOIN airLanguage_memberUploaded b ON a.memberSeq = b.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND a.memberSeq = #{memberSeq}
select a.questionSeq ,a.content ,a.userID ,a.language_select ,a.writetime FROM question a WHERE 1=1 AND a.userID = #{memberSeq};

SELECT a.ansSeq ,a.ansQuestionSeq ,a.ansUserId ,a.ansContent ,a.ansWriteTime ,b.questionSeq FROM answer a LEFT JOIN question b ON b.questionSeq = a.ansQuestionSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.ansUserId = #{memberSeq};

SELECT b.questionSeq ,a.ansContent ,a.ansWriteTime FROM answer a LEFT JOIN question b on b.questionSeq = a.ansQuestionSeq where 1=1 and a.ansQuestionSeq = b.questionSeq and a.ansSelect = 1 and a.ansUserId = #{memberSeq};
